subject: From the Desk Of: Dr. Olayemi
body:
From the Desk Of: Dr. Olayemi Cardoso
The New Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN)
Zaria Street, Off Samuel Akintola Street ,
Garki 11, Garki-Abuja.
Our Ref: FGN/CBN/NIG/09/2023.
Attention: ,
I am contacting you because I have just resumed office as the new
Central Bank governor and I have gone through your transaction file
and found out that you are yet to receive your funds.
Now, before we can proceed you are required to get back to us
immediately to enable us to know that you are still alive and you have
72 hours to get back to us immediately otherwise we will consider your
transaction to be canceled if you are not alive to receive your funds.
This instruction came from above from our President to make sure that
I get in touch with you before I proceed with your transaction for you
to receive funds.
Once again, thank you and may God bless you.
Very Truly Yours,
Dr. Olayemi Cardoso
The Governor of the Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN).

subject: Re:  From the Desk Of: Dr. Olayemi
body:
Hello Dr. Olayemi Cardoso,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate you taking the time to inform me about my funds. It's good to know that you have gone through my file and are working towards ensuring that I receive them.

I understand the importance of confirming my existence before proceeding with any transactions. Could you please provide me with more details on how I can verify my identity? I want to make sure that everything is in order so that I can receive my funds as soon as possible.

Thank you once again for your assistance, and may God bless you too.

Best wishes,
Donnie
